body_html:
The prebuilt binaries 1.6 binaries are indeed using cuda 9.0.
Why did you need to "build" tf, as you already have cuda 9.0?

to install the release candidates, you will need to run:
pip install tensorflow-gpu --pre --upgrade

body:
The prebuilt binaries 1.6 binaries are indeed using cuda 9.0.
Why did you need to "build" tf, as you already have cuda 9.0?

to install the release candidates, you will need to run:
`pip install tensorflow-gpu --pre --upgrade`
